name: Just Fireball!!!
description:
Just Fireball is a mobile Puzzle game where you place shapes over enemies, trying to incompace all of them and blow them all to bits in 1 move. Each level has their own combination of shapes, layouts and enemies. Try and complete them all!

This game was made over 6 weeks as a solo project, as part of my studies at SAE Brisbane. I did all of the programming and design of the game, while visual assets and sounds were sourced from the internet. Look below for some of them.

Credits Music & sound effects
  • Stage Completion sound: https://freesound.org/people/humanoide9000/sounds/466133/
  • Music: Fantasy Motion (loop+ready) & Now We Feast by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
